_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Steps to develop mindfulness of breathin: Sit down cross-legged, with the body straight
Establish mindfulness
Breathe in and out mindfully
Practice breathing in experiencing the whole body
Practice breathing out experiencing the whole body
Practice breathing in stilling the body’s motion
Practice breathing out stilling the body’s motion
Practice breathing in experiencing rapture
Practice breathing out experiencing rapture
Practice breathing in experiencing bliss
Practice breathing out experiencing bliss
Practice breathing in experiencing the mind
Practice breathing out experiencing the mind
Practice breathing in gladdening the mind
Practice breathing out gladdening the mind
Practice breathing in immersing the mind
Practice breathing out immersing the mind
Practice breathing in freeing the mind
Practice breathing out freeing the mind
Practice breathing in observing impermanence
Practice breathing out observing impermanence
Practice breathing in observing fading away
Practice breathing out observing fading away
Practice breathing in observing cessation
Practice breathing out observing cessation
Practice breathing in observing letting go
Practice breathing out observing letting go
